jhelp.android.api.view

Class BufferedImageView

  • java.lang.Object
    • View
      • jhelp.android.api.view.BufferedImageView

  • public class BufferedImageView
extends View
    View with a buffered image inside, where can draw with on using getCanvasBuffer() and getPaintBuffer(). To see last changes, refresh with refreshImageView().
    It is possible, if the layout where the view is allowed it, to change the view size with setImageViewDimension(int, int).
    To know the real image size use : getImageViewWidth() and getImageViewHeight()
    Author:
    JHelp
